info.description: Ambari REST APIs has inherent support for querying, sorting and pagination

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The number of resources to be returned for the paged response.

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: The starting page resource (inclusive). Valid values are :offset | "start"

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: The ending page resource (inclusive). Valid values are :offset | "end"
